remarks.para: These behaviors are inherited by child objects.
Modifications are applied in the order of the collection. The last write wins.

MemberSignature.Value: public Microsoft.Azure.Batch.RemoteLoginSettings GetRemoteLoginSettings (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors = null);

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.Azure.Batch.RemoteLoginSettings GetRemoteLoginSettings(class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors) cil managed

Docs.param: A collection of instances that are applied to the Batch service request after the .
Docs.summary: Gets the settings required for remote login to a compute node.

remarks.para: This is a blocking operation. For a non-blocking equivalent, see .

This method can be invoked only if the pool is created with a property. If this method is invoked on pools created with , then Batch service returns 409 (Conflict). For pools with a property, one of the GetRDPFileAsync/GetRDPFile methods must be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Threading.Tasks.Task<Microsoft.Azure.Batch.RemoteLoginSettings> GetRemoteLoginSettingsAsync (System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Microsoft.Azure.Batch.BatchClientBehavior> additionalBehaviors = null, System.Threading.CancellationToken cancellationToken = null);

A for controlling the lifetime of the asynchronous operation.
Docs.summary: Gets the settings required for remote login to a compute node.
Docs.returns: A that represents the asynchronous operation.

remarks.para: The get remote login settings operation runs asynchronously.

This method can be invoked only if the pool is created with a property. If this method is invoked on pools created with , then Batch service returns 409 (Conflict). For pools with a property, one of the GetRDPFileAsync/GetRDPFile methods must be used.
